page.title: 11Domestic Equipment
page.content: I did a test on how many people in my class have things that help you in the home.I found out that 6 people in my class have a microwave, 24 people in my class have a cooker, 24 people in my class have a frige or a freezer, 17 people in my class have a tumble dryer, 24 people in my class have a washing mashine, 7 people in my class have a dish washer, 23 people in my class have a telephone, 24 people in my class have a T.V, 15 people in my class have a video, 13 people in my class have a computer, 15 people in my class have a food processer. The numbers are not quite right because 5 people were away when I asked them.
